paragraph: Kirtane & Pandit is an Accounting, Auditing & Consulting firm with a well-established network of financial experts across India. Our motto 'Step ahead, Always', reflects our value-added approach in delivering sound financial solutions while we partner with you in your journey of growth. With our extensive experience of 65+ years, we deliver a wide range of professional services in the areas of Assurance, Accounting & Advisory to reputed & listed companies from various industries across the globe.
heading: Delivering Quality Assurance and Financial Solutions since 1956

header.title: Why Kirtane & Pandit?
header.paragraph: Kirtane & Pandit are committed to establishing and nurturing long-term relationships that illustrate our experience and aptitude of years to assist our clients to accomplish real attainment.

sections.title: Tailor-Made Approach
sections.description: Our accredited partners and dedicated staff bring professionalism and specialization to cater to each client’s unique needs. With a focus on personalized service, we surpass expectations by infusing integrity and delivering customized solutions.

sections.title: Ethical Practices
sections.description: Our firm with an unwavering commitment to ethics, upholding high values in every aspect of our work. We consistently exceed client expectations while maintaining integrity as our guiding principle.

sections.title: Partnering Growth
sections.description: Kirtane & Pandit, spanning across territories, approaches every endeavor with the same standard of enthusiasm, integrity, and ethical practices. We forge partnerships that foster growth, leveraging expertise with a global perspective.

sections.title: Robust Frameworks
sections.description: Professionalism is at the core of Kirtane & Pandit’s promise, ensuring strong practices in all our professional engagements. Our sincere team works tirelessly for the betterment of our clients.

sections.title: Global Perspective
sections.description: With Kirtane & Pandit, clients benefit from our global perspective and exposure to diverse industries. We bring new experiences and insights, working within timelines to provide the best results.

services.title: Attest & Assurance
services.description: Assuring accuracy and reliability of financial statements through independent examination and verification.

services.title: IND - AS, I GAAP, IFRS Advisory
services.description: Expert guidance on international accounting standards to ensure compliance and seamless financial reporting.

services.title: Internal Audit & Risk Management
services.description: Evaluating internal controls, identifying risks, and implementing effective risk management strategies.

services.title: IFC Advisory
services.description: Assisting with the implementation and optimization of Internal Financial Controls to enhance governance and mitigate financial risks.
